documentation.summary: Health Check
documentation.description: Returns the operational status and name of the agent, confirming it is ready to receive tasks from the Supervisor.

documentation.summary: Execute Documentation Generation Task (Supervisor Compliant)
documentation.description: This is the main operational endpoint, compliant with the Supervisor pattern. It receives a task assignment (containing code, git URL, or zip file) and returns the generated OpenAPI documentation. It utilizes Long-Term Memory (LTM) to cache and retrieve results for identical tasks based on input hashing.
documentation.requestBodySchema: {"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID for the message."},"sender":{"type":"string","example":"supervisor"},"recipient":{"type":"string","example":"documentation_generator_agent"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["task_assignment"]},"related_message_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the task request."},"results/task":{"type":"object","properties":{"language":{"type":"string","description":"Target language (e.g., javascript, python)."},"git_repo_url":{"type":"string","description":"Optional Git repository URL for cloning."},"zip_file_base64":{"type":"string","description":"Optional Base64 encoded zip archive of the project."},"code_files_base64":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"file_path":{"type":"string"},"content_base64":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Optional array of file objects with content_base64."},"search_patterns":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Optional glob patterns for file search (e.g., **/*routes*/**)."},"existing_documentation":{"type":"object","description":"Optional existing OpenAPI documentation object to merge with."}},"required":["language"]}},"required":["type","results/task"]}
documentation.successResponseSchema: {"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string"},"sender":{"type":"string","example":"documentation_generator_agent"},"recipient":{"type":"string","example":"supervisor"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["task_response"]},"related_message_id":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["completed"]},"results/task":{"type":"object","properties":{"status_message":{"type":"string"},"endpoints_found":{"type":"integer"},"ltm_hit":{"type":"boolean","description":"True if the result was served from LTM."},"file_by_file_results":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Results broken down by processed file.","properties":{"file_path":{"type":"string"},"endpoints_found":{"type":"integer"},"documentation":{"type":"array"}}}},"merged_documentation":{"type":"object","description":"The generated or merged OpenAPI documentation object."}}}},"required":["message_id","sender","recipient","type","status","results/task"]}

errorResponses.description: Internal error during the agentic loop (e.g., AI failure, file processing error, or configuration issue). Details provided in results/task.error_details.

get.description: Returns the operational status and name of the agent, confirming it is ready to receive tasks from the Supervisor.

post.description: This is the main operational endpoint, compliant with the Supervisor pattern. It receives a task assignment (containing code, git URL, or zip file) and returns the generated OpenAPI documentation. It utilizes Long-Term Memory (LTM) to cache and retrieve results for identical tasks based on input hashing.

ltm_hit.description: True if the result was served from LTM.

items.description: Results broken down by processed file.

merged_documentation.description: The generated or merged OpenAPI documentation object.

500.description: Internal error during the agentic loop (e.g., AI failure, file processing error, or configuration issue). Details provided in results/task.error_details.

git_repo_url.description: Optional Git repository URL for cloning.

zip_file_base64.description: Optional Base64 encoded zip archive of the project.

code_files_base64.description: Optional array of file objects with content_base64.

search_patterns.description: Optional glob patterns for file search (e.g., **/*routes*/**).

existing_documentation.description: Optional existing OpenAPI documentation object to merge with.

documentation.summary: Health check endpoint for monitoring agent status.
documentation.description: Returns the operational status of the Documentation Generator Agent (LTM-Enabled) and its name.

documentation.summary: Executes a task assignment received from a Supervisor agent.
documentation.description: Receives a Supervisor-compliant task assignment containing code source (Git URL, Base64 files, or Zip), analyzes it for API endpoints (using LTM if available), and returns the generated or merged OpenAPI documentation.
documentation.requestBodySchema: {"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string"},"sender":{"type":"string"},"recipient":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["task_assignment"]},"results/task":{"type":"object","properties":{"language":{"type":"string","description":"Programming language to analyze (e.g., javascript, python)."},"git_repo_url":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"URL of the Git repository to clone and analyze."},"search_patterns":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"nullable":true,"description":"Glob patterns for files to include in analysis."},"zip_file_base64":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Base64 encoded zip file content for analysis."},"code_files_base64":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Array of specific code file objects, each with file_path and content_base64."},"existing_documentation":{"type":"object","nullable":true,"description":"Existing OpenAPI documentation (JSON object) to be merged with new findings."}},"required":["language"]}},"required":["message_id","type","results/task"]}
documentation.successResponseSchema: {"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"type":"string"},"sender":{"type":"string","example":"documentation_generator_agent"},"recipient":{"type":"string","example":"supervisor"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["task_response"]},"related_message_id":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["completed"]},"results/task":{"type":"object","properties":{"status_message":{"type":"string","description":"A high-level message about the execution status (e.g., LTM Hit or number of endpoints found)."},"endpoints_found":{"type":"integer"},"file_by_file_results":{"type":"array"},"merged_documentation":{"type":"object","description":"The final OpenAPI 3.0 specification."}},"required":["status_message","endpoints_found","merged_documentation"]}},"required":["message_id","status","results/task"]}

errorResponses.description: Internal server error or failure during the agentic loop (e.g., Git failure, AI API error, or file processing error). Returns a Supervisor-compliant error response.

get.summary: Health check endpoint for monitoring agent status.
get.description: Returns the operational status of the Documentation Generator Agent (LTM-Enabled) and its name.

post.summary: Executes a task assignment received from a Supervisor agent.
post.description: Receives a Supervisor-compliant task assignment containing code source (Git URL, Base64 files, or Zip), analyzes it for API endpoints (using LTM if available), and returns the generated or merged OpenAPI documentation.

status_message.description: A high-level message about the execution status (e.g., LTM Hit or number of endpoints found).

500.description: Internal server error or failure during the agentic loop (e.g., Git failure, AI API error, or file processing error). Returns a Supervisor-compliant error response.

language.description: Programming language to analyze (e.g., javascript, python).

git_repo_url.description: URL of the Git repository to clone and analyze.

search_patterns.description: Glob patterns for files to include in analysis.

zip_file_base64.description: Base64 encoded zip file content for analysis.

code_files_base64.description: Array of specific code file objects, each with file_path and content_base64.

existing_documentation.description: Existing OpenAPI documentation (JSON object) to be merged with new findings.

documentation.summary: Create a new event
documentation.description: Creates a new event record. Requires user authentication.
documentation.requestBodySchema: JSON object containing event details (e.g., title, description, date).
documentation.successResponseSchema: JSON object representing the newly created event.

documentation.summary: Retrieve all events
documentation.description: Fetches a list of all events accessible to the authenticated user.
documentation.successResponseSchema: Array of JSON objects, each representing an event.

documentation.summary: Register a new user
documentation.description: Creates a new user account using provided credentials (e.g., email, password, and optionally name).

documentation.summary: Log in a user
documentation.description: Authenticates the user using credentials and typically returns an authentication token (JWT) upon successful login.

post.description: Creates a new event record. Requires user authentication.

get.description: Fetches a list of all events accessible to the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new user account using provided credentials (e.g., email, password, and optionally name).
Authenticates the user using credentials and typically returns an authentication token (JWT) upon successful login.

documentation.summary: Create a new event
documentation.description: Requires authentication (auth middleware). Creates a new event resource.
documentation.requestBodySchema: JSON object representing the event details (e.g., title, date, description).
documentation.successResponseSchema: The newly created Event object, usually including an ID.
errorResponses: 400 Bad Request (Validation failure or missing required fields)

documentation.summary: Retrieve a list of all events
documentation.description: Requires authentication (auth middleware). Fetches an array of event resources.

documentation.summary: Register a new user account.
documentation.description: Handles user registration by accepting credentials and creating a new user record in the database.

documentation.summary: Authenticate user and generate an access token.
documentation.description: Handles user login by verifying credentials and returning an authentication token.

post.description: Requires authentication (auth middleware). Creates a new event resource.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all events
get.description: Requires authentication (auth middleware). Fetches an array of event resources.

post.description: Handles user registration by accepting credentials and creating a new user record in the database.

post.summary: Authenticate user and generate an access token.
post.description: Handles user login by verifying credentials and returning an authentication token.

documentation.summary: Login user and generate auth token.
documentation.description: Authenticates the user using credentials and returns the user object and a new authentication token.

documentation.summary: Register a new user account.
documentation.description: Creates a new user account with provided data, logs the user in, and returns the user object and a new authentication token.

documentation.summary: Logout the current user.
documentation.description: Invalidates the current session or refresh token on the server side.

documentation.summary: Refresh authentication token.
documentation.description: Uses the existing authentication mechanism (e.g., refresh token cookie) to obtain a new access token.

documentation.summary: Update current user profile.
documentation.description: Updates fields of the currently authenticated user's profile.

post.summary: Login user and generate auth token.
post.description: Authenticates the user using credentials and returns the user object and a new authentication token.
Creates a new user account with provided data, logs the user in, and returns the user object and a new authentication token.
Invalidates the current session or refresh token on the server side.
Uses the existing authentication mechanism (e.g., refresh token cookie) to obtain a new access token.

patch.description: Updates fields of the currently authenticated user's profile.

documentation.summary: Retrieve a list of all students.
documentation.description: Returns a list of all existing Student objects.

documentation.summary: Create a new student.
documentation.description: Adds a new student record to the system.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all students.
get.description: Returns a list of all existing Student objects.

post.description: Adds a new student record to the system.

documentation.summary: User login and authentication
documentation.description: Authenticates a user using credentials and returns an authentication token or session identifier.

documentation.summary: Register a new user account
documentation.description: Creates a new user account by accepting required registration details (e.g., username, email, password).

post.description: Authenticates a user using credentials and returns an authentication token or session identifier.
Creates a new user account by accepting required registration details (e.g., username, email, password).

documentation.summary: Get authenticated student's profile data by ID or associated profile ID.
documentation.description: Allows students to fetch their own profile, or Admins/Teachers/Accountants to fetch specific student data. Authentication required. Roles: student, admin, teacher, accountant.

documentation.summary: Get specific student profile by ID.
documentation.description: Allows students to fetch their own profile, or Admins/Teachers/Accountants to fetch specific student data. Authentication required. Roles: student, admin, teacher, accountant.

documentation.summary: Bulk promote students to the next semester based on criteria.
documentation.description: Promotes a batch of students (e.g., all students in a specific class or semester) to the subsequent semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Bulk demote students to the previous semester based on criteria.
documentation.description: Demotes a batch of students to the previous semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Bulk promote students to the next academic class based on criteria.
documentation.description: Promotes a batch of students (e.g., all students in a specific class) to the next academic class. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Bulk demote students to the previous academic class based on criteria.
documentation.description: Demotes a batch of students to the previous academic class. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Get a list of all students.
documentation.description: Retrieves a list of all student records. Teachers might see a filtered list based on their subjects. Requires Admin, Teacher, or Accountant roles.

documentation.summary: Get a single student by ID.
documentation.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific student. Requires Admin, Teacher, Student (self), or Accountant roles.

documentation.summary: Create a new student record with required documents.
documentation.description: Registers a new student, accepting text fields for student data and multiple file uploads (profile picture and documents). Requires Admin or Accountant roles.
documentation.errorResponses: 400: Bad Request (Missing fields/files), 401: Unauthorized, 403: Forbidden, 500: Server Error

documentation.summary: Update an existing student record and optional documents.
documentation.description: Updates student data, optionally replacing existing uploaded documents. Requires Admin, Teacher, Accountant, or Student (self) roles.
documentation.errorResponses: 400: Bad Request, 401: Unauthorized, 403: Forbidden, 404: Not Found

documentation.summary: Delete a student record by ID.
documentation.description: Permanently deletes a student record and associated data/files. Requires Admin role.

documentation.summary: Promote a specific student to the next academic level (class or year).
documentation.description: Increases the academic level of a single student. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous academic level (class or year).
documentation.description: Decreases the academic level of a single student. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Promote a specific student to the next semester.
documentation.description: Updates a single student's registered semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous semester.
documentation.description: Updates a single student's registered semester to the previous one. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

documentation.summary: Bulk promote multiple students (using filters).
documentation.description: Promotes a group of students based on criteria provided in the request body. Requires Admin role.

documentation.summary: Apply a bulk fee increase across filtered students or classes.
documentation.description: Updates the tuition or associated fees for a selected group of students, typically by a percentage or fixed amount. Requires Admin role.

documentation.summary: Update the fee payment status for a specific student.
documentation.description: Allows updating fields related to student fee payment tracking (e.g., status, last payment date). Requires Admin role.

get.summary: Get authenticated student's profile data by ID or associated profile ID.
get.description: Allows students to fetch their own profile, or Admins/Teachers/Accountants to fetch specific student data. Authentication required. Roles: student, admin, teacher, accountant.

get.summary: Get specific student profile by ID.
get.description: Allows students to fetch their own profile, or Admins/Teachers/Accountants to fetch specific student data. Authentication required. Roles: student, admin, teacher, accountant.

put.summary: Bulk promote students to the next semester based on criteria.
put.description: Promotes a batch of students (e.g., all students in a specific class or semester) to the subsequent semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

filter.description: Criteria to select students (e.g., currentClassId, currentSemester)

put.summary: Bulk demote students to the previous semester based on criteria.
put.description: Demotes a batch of students to the previous semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

filter.description: Criteria to select students (e.g., currentClassId, currentSemester)

put.summary: Bulk promote students to the next academic class based on criteria.
put.description: Promotes a batch of students (e.g., all students in a specific class) to the next academic class. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

put.summary: Bulk demote students to the previous academic class based on criteria.
put.description: Demotes a batch of students to the previous academic class. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

get.summary: Get a list of all students.
get.description: Retrieves a list of all student records. Teachers might see a filtered list based on their subjects. Requires Admin, Teacher, or Accountant roles.

post.summary: Create a new student record with required documents.
post.description: Registers a new student, accepting text fields for student data and multiple file uploads (profile picture and documents). Requires Admin or Accountant roles.

get.summary: Get a single student by ID.
get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific student. Requires Admin, Teacher, Student (self), or Accountant roles.

put.summary: Update an existing student record and optional documents.
put.description: Updates student data, optionally replacing existing uploaded documents. Requires Admin, Teacher, Accountant, or Student (self) roles.

delete.summary: Delete a student record by ID.
delete.description: Permanently deletes a student record and associated data/files. Requires Admin role.

put.summary: Promote a specific student to the next academic level (class or year).
put.description: Increases the academic level of a single student. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

put.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous academic level (class or year).
put.description: Decreases the academic level of a single student. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

put.summary: Promote a specific student to the next semester.
put.description: Updates a single student's registered semester. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

put.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous semester.
put.description: Updates a single student's registered semester to the previous one. Requires Admin or Teacher roles.

patch.description: Promotes a group of students based on criteria provided in the request body. Requires Admin role.

patch.summary: Apply a bulk fee increase across filtered students or classes.
patch.description: Updates the tuition or associated fees for a selected group of students, typically by a percentage or fixed amount. Requires Admin role.

patch.summary: Update the fee payment status for a specific student.
patch.description: Allows updating fields related to student fee payment tracking (e.g., status, last payment date). Requires Admin role.

documentation.summary: Promote all students matching specific criteria (e.g., class/section) to the next semester.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk semester promotions.
documentation.requestBodySchema: application/json (e.g., { classId: '...', currentSemester: N, nextSemester: N+1 })

documentation.summary: Demote all students matching specific criteria to the previous semester.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk semester demotions.
documentation.requestBodySchema: application/json (e.g., { classId: '...', currentSemester: N, previousSemester: N-1 })

documentation.summary: Promote all students matching specific criteria to the next class.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk class promotions.

documentation.summary: Demote all students matching specific criteria to the previous class.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk class demotions.

documentation.summary: Get the detailed data for a specific student profile. Used typically by the student themselves or authorized staff.
documentation.description: Requires Student, Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role. Logic in controller must ensure students can only view their own profile unless authorized.

documentation.summary: Get the detailed data for a specific student profile.
documentation.description: Requires Student, Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role.

documentation.summary: Retrieve a list of all students.
documentation.description: Requires Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role. Teachers may only see students relevant to them (filtering happens in controller).

documentation.summary: Retrieve a single student by ID.
documentation.description: Requires Student (viewing own profile), Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role.

documentation.summary: Create a new student record.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Accountant role. Supports uploading student documents and profile picture via multipart form data.
documentation.requestBodySchema: multipart/form-data containing student details and up to 8 file fields: profilePicture, cnicFront, cnicBack, bForm, characterCertificate, previousClassResult, class10Result, class12Result.

documentation.summary: Update an existing student record by ID.
documentation.description: Requires Admin, Teacher, Accountant, or Student role (with authorization logic). Supports updating student details and documents via multipart form data.
documentation.requestBodySchema: multipart/form-data containing updated student details and potentially new file uploads (profilePicture, cnicFront, etc.).

documentation.summary: Delete a student record by ID.
documentation.description: Requires Admin role only.

documentation.summary: Promote a specific student to the next class level.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for individual student promotion.
documentation.requestBodySchema: application/json (Optional parameters for target class/section, otherwise auto-increment)

documentation.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous class level.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for individual student demotion.

documentation.summary: Promote a specific student to the next semester.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role.

documentation.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous semester.
documentation.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role.

documentation.summary: Bulk action to promote a group of students based on criteria.
documentation.description: Requires Admin role. Updates the class or status of multiple students simultaneously.

documentation.summary: Bulk action to increase fees for selected students or classes.
documentation.description: Requires Admin role. Typically takes a percentage or fixed amount and criteria for application.

documentation.summary: Update the fee payment status for a specific student.
documentation.description: Requires Admin role (can be extended to Accountant).
documentation.successResponseSchema: application/json (Updated Student Object with new fee status)

put.summary: Promote all students matching specific criteria (e.g., class/section) to the next semester.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk semester promotions.

put.summary: Demote all students matching specific criteria to the previous semester.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk semester demotions.

put.summary: Promote all students matching specific criteria to the next class.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk class promotions.

put.summary: Demote all students matching specific criteria to the previous class.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for bulk class demotions.

get.summary: Get the detailed data for a specific student profile. Used typically by the student themselves or authorized staff.
get.description: Requires Student, Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role. Logic in controller must ensure students can only view their own profile unless authorized.

get.summary: Get the detailed data for a specific student profile.
get.description: Requires Student, Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all students.
get.description: Requires Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role. Teachers may only see students relevant to them (filtering happens in controller).

post.description: Requires Admin or Accountant role. Supports uploading student documents and profile picture via multipart form data.

get.summary: Retrieve a single student by ID.
get.description: Requires Student (viewing own profile), Admin, Teacher, or Accountant role.

put.summary: Update an existing student record by ID.
put.description: Requires Admin, Teacher, Accountant, or Student role (with authorization logic). Supports updating student details and documents via multipart form data.

delete.summary: Delete a student record by ID.

put.summary: Promote a specific student to the next class level.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for individual student promotion.

put.summary: Demote a specific student to the previous class level.
put.description: Requires Admin or Teacher role. Used for individual student demotion.

put.summary: Promote a specific student to the next semester.
Demote a specific student to the previous semester.

patch.summary: Bulk action to promote a group of students based on criteria.
patch.description: Requires Admin role. Updates the class or status of multiple students simultaneously.

patch.summary: Bulk action to increase fees for selected students or classes.
patch.description: Requires Admin role. Typically takes a percentage or fixed amount and criteria for application.

patch.summary: Update the fee payment status for a specific student.
patch.description: Requires Admin role (can be extended to Accountant).
